channel.title: healthTest
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from healthTest, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Wegovy pill now available at pharmacies
item.description: The Wegovy pill approved in December arrived at pharmacies nationwide on Monday. Patients now have a new way to take the weight loss medication.

item.title: More seniors are becoming homeless. Shelters are trying to adapt
item.description: Older adults are the fastest-growing homeless population across the U.S. Now some shelters are trying to make it easier to accommodate older people.

item.title: What is autistic burnout? And what can you do about it?
item.description: Many autistic people face challenges in their daily life while navigating a world made for neurotypical people.

item.title: Excessive Sleepiness and Driving: How to Reduce Crash Risk
item.description: In obstructive sleep apnea, using CPAP therapy more than 4 hours a night sharply cuts residual sleepiness and lowers crash risk. Medscape News Europe

item.title: NHS Holds Up Under Strikes as Streeting Signals Fresh Talks

item.title: Delirium Care in Arab ICUs: When Culture Matters
item.description: From prayer times to family vigils, everyday realities can alter how delirium presents — and how clinicians should respond. Medscape Middle East

item.title: NICE Recommends Age-Based CA125 Testing for Ovarian Cancer
item.description: NICE has proposed age-based CA125 thresholds to improve early ovarian cancer detection while reducing unnecessary scans in younger women. Medscape New...
